about_the_game:
Echoes of a Dying Realm




Step into a world beyond repair, where only the strongest persevere.

Lorn Vale is a free-roaming post-apocalyptic Survival Sandbox RPG. Can you endure the merciless cruelty of a land on the brink of oblivion? Your mission is to survive, climb the food chain, and carve out a living by any means necessary.

Your journey is shaped by every choice and action you take, ensuring that no two playthroughs are ever the same.

Fight for Survival




Feel the tension as you engage in real-time tactical combat.
Every encounter is a test of your skill and wits, where survival is never granted, and sometimes you barely make it through the day (or night).

Adapt and Overcome




Every choice plays a key part in creating your own unique character.

Customize your stats and skills, pick from several backgrounds, experiment with game-changing mutations, and even form alliances with a multitude of different factions.

Survive in a Ruined World




Explore the barren wastelands and encounter the eccentric residents who have no choice but to call it home.

Trade with wandering caravans, pick up bounties and find refuge in what few towns still exist. Experience a savage, handcrafted open-world where the map stays the same, but encounters and events are always different.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains blood splatters and violence towards characters in a 2D-pixel art style.

short_description: A free-roaming post-apocalyptic Survival Sandbox RPG in which you must weather the unrelenting brutality of a dying world. Shape your own unique journey, forge alliances. Make difficult choices in this systems-driven game full of procedurally generated events. Amidst the ruins, your story begins.
